timeline.message: MULE-18543: ComponentAst parameter provide a way to know if value comes from a default value or DSL

timeline.bodyText:
I'm pretty sure this is also being done when value is set: getModel().getDefaultValue()
Wouldn't be better to set the isDefault=true when the value was set and populated from the getModel().getDefaultValue()? Or maybe I'm wrong and the default value already comes from the XSD.
timeline.author: gsfernandes

replies.bodyText: If the default value comes from the XSD we should leave this logic here to be based on the model definition.
replies.author: gsfernandes
